answers.answer: My son was born at 36 exactly. And he was absolutely fine and healthy. I was not induced, he came on his own. Good luck!
How high is going your blood pressure?

My daughter, my first, was an emergency csection with preeclampsia and hellp syndrome at 34 going on 35 weeks. She was a 3lb little thing with jaundice, had a hard time feeding at first (required feeding tube) but only for 2 weeks. Then I got to bring her home :) she did just fine. I'm hoping this pregnancy goes a lot smoother.

Well I'm on bp meds so even being on that I get nervous and it is always high when I first get to the Dr its usually 140/90 but once they give me some time and take it manually it will be between 111-130/80-88. The hospital I was going to deliver at doesn't have a nicu so I'm wondering if I should schedule the induction for the hospital an hr away that does instead of the hospital I planned?

Hiii am and, my drs are debating if my twins should come out this sat or wed because of all the health complications. I have hbp, genestational diabetics, n now that desease with the liver....I'm upset because they haven't deside on a date and I feel so done...I'm going to do research on preclampsia now because I may have that too...the Dr said that if they take the twins out now I'm 35 n half they most likely be in the nicu...I'm also worried..best wishes hun all we can do is pray n ask god to be our Dr.
my forth was born at 35 weeksan was heathy...
I hope everything goes good for you. I've been praying like crazy I just want to make the best decision for my baby girl. Can't wait til Thursdays Dr apt and go over the issues with my Dr! =)

Omg I have an appt Thursday as well..keep me posted. I will keep u in my prayers. I have become emotional fpr the past two days and I know that's not good for the baby but I can't help it...I don't like the way I feel..
*babies

Oh wow! Let me know what ur Dr says and I'll keep you posted. I hope for good news! Maybe I can keep this little girl in there for another week or so.. I've not gotten super emotional yet about it. But I'm sure as Thursday comes I'll be a wreck if I get bad news. :/
Pray. Have a safe and blessed pregnancy <3
And delivery :)
Thank you! =)

I had three boys and all born between weeks 35-36.  They were very healthy, and there was no need for any of them to stay at the hospital any longer that the 48hrs.  They were all between 5-6lbs.  Don't worry!! Relax and give your baby the best last days in your belly :)

Thank you! I'll be 35 weeks Thursday so I'm hoping they let me know some kind of news at Dr. =) I'm trying to not over stress. At least I'm ready for her carsrat installed and all bags are packed and ready. =)

Thanks Tania...my fear is for them to have to stay in the nicu..I don't want that...I started researching online and I'm more calm about waiting another week if the dr want cause its for the babies well being.. What's another week right???
How did your appt go?I'm good Dr thinks if levels stay where they r now I will make it to 37 weeks but they will induce at 37! =)

The doctors have finally decided today to schedule me for thursday for a csection. I know I won't last until Thursday..I'm very swollen from head to toe and contractions are everyday now..I don't know why these drs are waiting so long...let's see what happens I'll.keep u posted. Best wishes
I hope all goes good for you! that's crazy of your having a c section they aren't taking babies sooner especially with contractions! Best wishes to you too! =)
My first son I had high blood pressure 205/195 and they induced me at 34 weeks.. he was healthy etc. And 7lbs.. it will all be ok! (:

question: Hello there I'm a second time mom had my first at 37 weeks bc of preeclampsia.. now I'm 35 weeks and was told today I'm borderline on my protein in my urine.. I see the Dr on Thursday and shes going to evaluate me and determine if I should be induced earlier than 37 weeks. Any moms had their babies at 35-36 weeks and everything be ok? I'm starting to worry. :/ thanks!
title: induction before 36 weeks
